utilities.jni
Class JNIMethod

java.lang.Object
  utilities.jni.JNIMethod

public final class JNIMethod
extends java.lang.Object

helper class to construct a jmethodID in native code
delegate is the object on which to call the method

Author:
Jan Hegewald

Constructor Detail

JNIMethod

public JNIMethod(java.lang.Object newDelegate,
                 java.lang.String methodName,
                 java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)

JNIMethod

public JNIMethod(java.lang.Object newDelegate,
                 java.lang.String methodName,
                 java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterTypes,
                 java.lang.Class<?>[] specializedParameterTypes,
                 java.lang.Class<?> returnType,
                 java.lang.Class<?> specializedReturnType)
use this constructor to provide different signatures for the real method and for the descriptor, e.g. a method argument type might be Object.class, but you want to provide an int[].class instead (which of course is a Object)
if a specialized return type is provided, the developer has to ensure that a downcast from returnType to the specializedReturnType is possible during runtime, this can be the case for a generic return type which will be of type Object during runtime due to type erasure
